titles.title: To make technical amendments to update statutory references to provisions reclassified to title 34, United States Code, and to correct related technical errors.
To make technical amendments to update statutory references to provisions reclassified to title 34, United States Code, and to correct related technical errors.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.
Reported by the Committee on Judiciary. H. Rept. 118-233.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 41.

action.text: Mr. Cline moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 3578.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

committee.name: House Judiciary
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To

bill.summary: This bill makes technical amendments to the U.S. Code to revise references to statutory provisions reclassified to Title 34 (Crime Control And Law Enforcement).
